title: Doner kebab
description: Tender grilled meat in warm pita bread with fresh crisp vegetables, onions, and our special garlic sauce

title: Chicken Shawarma
description: Slow-roasted marinated chicken with creamy tahini sauce, pickled vegetables, and fresh tomatoes wrapped in soft bread

title: Lamb Kebab
description: Succulent seasoned lamb skewers chargrilled to perfection with roasted bell peppers, onions, and zucchini

title: Mixed Grill
description: Premium combination of tender chicken, juicy lamb, and beef served over fluffy basmati rice with grilled vegetables

title: Falafel Wrap
description: Golden crispy chickpea fritters with creamy hummus, fresh lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, and tahini dressing

title: Beef Koobideh
description: Authentic Persian-style ground beef kebab infused with fragrant herbs, spices, and saffron served with rice

title: Chicken Tikka
description: Tender Indian-style marinated chicken cooked in tandoor with aromatic spices, served with creamy yogurt sauce and rice

title: Seafood Platter
description: Fresh grilled fish filet and succulent shrimp tossed with lemon garlic butter, herbs, and served with seasonal vegetables
